# Roused Anger (Ex)
## Overview
*Roused Anger (Ex)*: The barbarian may enter a rage even if [[Fatigued|fatigued]]. While raging after using this ability, the barbarian is immune to the [[Fatigued|fatigued]] condition. Once this rage ends, the barbarian is [[Exhausted|exhausted]] for 10 minutes per round spent raging.

**Source:** Core Rulebook, pg. 33
